pullRequest.title: Make small fixes to GCP docs

nodes.bodyText:
Suggested change
        
          
    

        
      
    
    
      
          
            
            This guide walks you through generating a sample project followed by creating three http endpoints
          
          
            
            This guide walks you through generating a sample project followed by creating three HTTP endpoints
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -27,9 +27,9 @@ To complete this guide, you need:
 
 == Solution
 
-This guide walks you through running a Maven Archetype to generate a sample project then creating three http endpoints
-written with JAX-RS APIs, Servlet APIs or Vert.x Web APIs.  After building, you will then be able to deploy
-to Google Cloud.
+This guide walks you through generating a sample project followed by creating three http endpoints

I would drop the then here.
